abstract: NFL's committee on concussion research plans to make second attempt at long-range study on effects of brain injuries on players; committee member Dr Mitchel S Berger says study will be considerably broader than previous effort and workups will be more comprehensive.
snippet: A doctor involved with a new plan to evaluate long-term effects of brain injury on players says “there was no science” in a previous effort.
lead_paragraph: A doctor involved with a new plan to evaluate long-term effects of brain injury on players says “there was no science” in a previous effort.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Plans More Scientific Study of Concussions
